Summary: Estimate crossover using census weights 

```{r}
## Library packages 
library(here)
source(here("code", "helpers.R"))

## Read in dmf 
dmf <- fread(here("data", "censoc_dmf_clean.csv"))

dmf_filter <- dmf %>% filter(byear %in% 1890:1905)
```



```{r}
plot_grid(pooled_bwcrossover_census_weights, pooled_bwcrossover_census_weights_mortality_ratio, pooled_bwcrossover_nchs_weights, pooled_bwcrossover_nchs_weights_mortality_ratio)


# Save plots
ggsave(plot = pooled_bwcrossover_nchs_weights, filename = here("figures/appendix_bw_crossover_1890_1905_nchs_weights.png"), width = 7.5, height = 5, bg = "white")

# Save plots
ggsave(plot = pooled_bwcrossover_census_weights, filename = here("figures/appendix_bw_crossover_1890_1905_census_weights.png"), width = 7.5, height = 5, bg = "white")
```
